module.name: product_view_definition_relationship_properties
module.purpose: The Product view definition relationship properties application module supports the requirement to assign properties to product view definition relationships.

inscope.li: The assignment of properties to relationships between product view definitions.

uof.name: Product_View_Definition_Relationship_Properties
uof.description: The product view definition relationship properties UoF supports the assignment of properties to a Product_view_definition_relationship

aa.refpath: property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition_relationship product_definition
